channel.title: Need help please dementhium errors
channel.description:
ok so everytime i run the server on my vps it says server bound to port43594 thats all then i load the client and log in and this error pops up and it says unable to load acc
Server bound to port - 43594 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\g.bin (The system cannot f ind the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:212) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:104) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java: 38) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\g.bin (The system cannot f ind the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.fileBuffer(FileUtilities.java:20) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:133) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:214) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:47 1) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor. java:1110) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\g.bin (The system cannot f ind the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:212) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:104) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java: 38) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107) at f ind the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at if you can help me that will be great you will get owner on server ad i have great plans for coding

item.title: Need help please dementhium errors
item.dc:creator: @toryhiggs toryhiggs
item.description:
@toryhiggs wrote:

thats what ive been doing and ik its not my vps im currently hosting a 667 and im not using a short cus its dose this for dementhium 639 and eclipse 639 and i really want to host these two

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please dementhium errors
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\g.bin (The system cannot f ind the path specified)
Pretty much that means, your using a bad path. Meaning, that when you try to run your server that it doesn’t know where to load -whatever your trying to load- off of. Im guessing your using a shortcut or something? If your trying to run your servers client, try running it on your NORMAL computer, if that doesn’t work lemme know

Read full topic
